indicator_available: In December 2024, the Government of the Republic of Armenia approved the Employment Strategy for 2025-2031.
indicator_name: Existence of a developed and operationalized national strategy for youth employment, as a distinct strategy or as part of a national employment strategy
target: By 2020, develop and operationalize a global strategy for youth employment and implement the Global Jobs Pact of the International Labour Organization
source_organisation_1: Ministry of Labour and Social Affaires of RA
graph_title: Existence of a developed and operationalized national strategy for youth employment, as a distinct strategy or as part of a national employment strategy
